  • DIABETES
    MANAGEMENT
    Call (07) 55 746 133 for our clinic hours.
[/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||50px|” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”||0px|” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://coastgastroenterology.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/about-man.jpg” image_icon_width=”none” admin_label=”Blurb” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” image_max_width=”none” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text admin_label=”Dr Walker offers a wide variety of…” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Raleway||||” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_line_height=”18.6px” header_font=”Raleway||||” header_text_color=”#333333″ header_font_size=”16px” header_line_height=”3px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”]

>Dr Walker offers a wide variety of comprehensive gastroenterological services. Outpatient consulting is available in our private rooms at the Gold Coast Private Hospital. He conducts consultations from Suite 8, Gold Coast Private. Inpatient consultation is offered at the Gold Coast Private and Pindara Private Hospitals.

Please follow the links on the patient information page to discover more about the services offered.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#d6d6d6″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” admin_label=”Divider” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” disabled_on=”on|on|off” admin_label=”Divider” _builder_version=”4.16″ height=”30px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Download our online PDF
  • Pre-scope Diabetes Management – Colonoscopy + Gastroscopy
  • Pre-scope Diabetes Management – Gastroscopy

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”]

PRE PROCEDURE DIABETES MANAGEMENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Oral Hypoglycaemics (diabetes tablets)” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SGLT2 Inhibitors “flozins” 

  • example – Dapagliflozin (Forziga, Xigduo); Empagliflozin (Jiardiance, Jiardamet, Glyxambi)
    • Do not take the day prior to procedure, nor on the day of procedure

Other Oral Hypoglycaemics

  • example – Metformin, Glimepiride, Gliclazide, Pioglitazone, Acarbose, Sitagliptin 
    • Do not take your diabetes medication the morning of the procedure.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Insulin–dependent patients” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Insulin – dependent patients

For both morning and afternoon procedures           

  • Day prior to your procedure:
    • Take half the evening short acting insulin
    • Take half of the evening Lantus insulin
    • Take half the evening long acting insulin (if not using Lantus)
  • Day of procedure:
    • Do not take your morning insulin

Remember, you may consume apple juice and Gatorade-type drinks while on your clear liquid diet to maintain your “sugars”.

Please bring your medication with you to your procedure

  • You will be able to take your usual diabetes medication following the procedure when you resume a normal diet.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#e8e8e8″ background_image=”https://coastgastroenterology.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/CG-banner_BG.jpg” custom_padding=”50px||50px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Make Appointment” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#16a39e” text_font_size=”40″ header_text_color=”#16a39e” header_font_size=”40px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” module_alignment=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”25″ text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

    MANAGEMENT
    Call (07) 55 746 133 for our clinic hours.

>Dr Walker offers a wide variety of comprehensive gastroenterological services. Outpatient consulting is available in our private rooms at the Gold Coast Private Hospital. He conducts consultations from Suite 8, Gold Coast Private. Inpatient consultation is offered at the Gold Coast Private and Pindara Private Hospitals.
